title: Canada
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,391 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 990L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and S
description: From Arctic lands to lush forests to bustling cities, Canada is a country with many different faces. Students will love to discover more about this amazing place.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
